title: IEFxRack
description: IEMidi is a simple, open-source MIDI editor that leverages RtMidi for its MIDI message handling. The editor is designed to map any MIDI message to various actions such as volume control, mute, console commands or opening files. It also includes a MIDI logger for monitoring MIDI messages in real-time.

title: IEMidi
description: IEMidi is a simple, open-source MIDI editor that leverages RtMidi for its MIDI message handling. The editor is designed to map any MIDI message to various actions such as volume control, mute, console commands or opening files. It also includes a MIDI logger for monitoring MIDI messages in real-time.

title: IECore
description: IECore is a open-source library designed for Windows and macOS applications that leverages ImGui as its user interface. The library includes an abstracted renderer class and robust logging, as well as useful utilities and ImGui extension logic. Currently, only Vulkan is implemented as a rendering backend, but support for additional backends will be added in the future.

title: 3D Audio and Gameplay Programming
description: A series of audio enhancement and gameplay mechanics programmed in UE5 and C++. This sandbox project comes with a video explanation of each technology along with the C++ code.
